item.title: About this site
item.description: This site exists because I happened to have an extra raspberry pi sitting around that I wasn’t using and thought it would be fun to host a super lightweight, performant site on it. Is this the cheapest way I can do things? No… because GitHub pages is free. But it’s more fun! After talking to my ISP and confirming that they are ok with it - which was really, really lucky, because most ISPs explicitly don’t allow it - I stood things up.
